module.name: Conferences
module.description: Allow creation of conference rooms where multiple people can talk together
module.changelog: *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10273 make sure at least one pin is set *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10273 dont allow blank pins *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9915 - Install issues. *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9850 dont reset the invalid pin count on an invalid pin *13.0.3* Fix undefined indexes when searching for conferences globally *13.0.2.4* Compatibility fix *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9467 Added search hooks *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.11* Cleanup
